titleStmt.title: The pleasant history of Tom Ladle; with the transactions of Peter the plowman, and Betty his mother Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Blare at the Looking-glass on London-bridge, near the Church,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Wing CD-ROM, 1996 gives a range of dates, 1682-1700.
O copy, reel 2447, is stained affecting legibility.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the Looking-glass on London-bridge, near the Church
